WSDL

definitions 为根节点，属性为

name：WS 名称，默认为“实现类 + Service”

targetNamespace：WS 目标命名空间，默认为“WS 实现类对应包名倒排后构成的地址”

definitions的5个子节点

types：描述了 WS 中所涉及的数据类型

portType：定义了 WS 接口名称portType.name（endpointInterface默认为“WS 实现类所实现的接口”），及其操作名称，以及每个操作的输入与输出消息

message：对相关消息进行了定义（供 types 与 portType 使用）

binding：提供了对 WS 的数据绑定方式

service：WS 名称及其端口名称service_port.name（portName默认为“WS 实现类 + Port”），以及对应的 WSDL 地址

SOAP

header

body

一、产品

soap风格 (JAX-WS规范JSR-224)

JAX-WS RI：https://jax-ws.java.net/ Oracle 官方提供的实现

Axis：http://axis.apache.org/

CXF：http://cxf.apache.org/

rest风格 (JAX-RS规范JSR-339)

Jersey：https://jersey.java.net/ Oracle 官方提供的实现

Restlet：http://restlet.com/

RESTEasy：http://resteasy.jboss.org/

CXF：http://cxf.apache.org/

二、JDK发布与调用

1.发布

定义接口

1//此注解必须
2@WebService
3public interface HelloService {
4    String say();
5}

实现接口

 1@WebService(serviceName = "HelloService",
 2        portName = "HelloServicePort",
 3        endpointInterface = "org.sllx.practice.jdkws.HelloService")
 4public class HelloServiceImpl implements HelloService {
 5    @Override
 6    public String say() {
 7        return "helloWorld";
 8    }
 9}

发布服务

1public class Server {
2    public static void main(String[] args){
3        String address = "http://localhost:8081/ws/soap/hello";
4        HelloService helloService = new HelloServiceImpl();
5        Endpoint.publish(address, helloService);
6        System.out.println("ws is published [" + address + "?wsdl]");
7    }
8}

访问http://localhost:8081/ws/soap/hello?wsdl即可查看详情

2.调用

静态客户端

wsimport http://localhost:8080/ws/soap/hello?wsdl//通过 WSDL 地址生成 class 文件

jar -cf client.jar . //通过 jar 命令将若干 class 文件压缩为一个 jar 包

rmdir /s/q demo //删除生成的 class 文件（删除根目录即可）

1public static void main(String[] args){
2     HelloService_Service hss = new HelloService_Service();
3     HelloService hs = hss.getHelloServicePort();
4     System.out.println(hs.say());
5}

动态代理客户端

只需提供HelloService接口，无需jar

 1public static void main(String[] args){
 2    try {
 3        URL wsdl = new URL("http://localhost:8081/ws/soap/hello?wsdl");
 4        QName serviceName = new QName("http://jdkws.practice.sllx.org/", "HelloService");
 5        QName portName = new QName("http://jdkws.practice.sllx.org/", "HelloServicePort");
 6        Service service = Service.create(wsdl, serviceName);
 7        HelloService helloService = service.getPort(portName, HelloService.class);
 8        String result = helloService.say();
 9        System.out.println(result);
10    } catch (Exception e) {
11        e.printStackTrace();
12    }
13}

三、CXF

User为自定义的POJO类

web发布示例集成spring

1.SOAP风格

定义接口

 1package top.rainynight.sitews.user.ws;
 2
 3import top.rainynight.sitews.user.entity.User;
 4import javax.jws.WebService;
 5
 6@WebService
 7public interface UserWS {
 8
 9    User lookOver(int id);
10}

实现接口

 1package top.rainynight.sitews.user.ws;
 2
 3import top.rainynight.sitews.user.entity.User;
 4import org.springframework.stereotype.Component;
 5
 6@Component("userWS")
 7public class UserWSImpl implements UserWS {
 8
 9    @Override
10    public User lookOver(int id) {
11        return new User();
12    }
13}

发布服务

①Jetty发布

配置依赖

 1<properties>
 2    <project.build.sourceEncoding>UTF-8</project.build.sourceEncoding>
 3    <cxf.version>3.0.0</cxf.version>
 4</properties>
 5
 6<dependencies>
 7    <dependency>
 8        <groupId>org.apache.cxf</groupId>
 9        <artifactId>cxf-rt-frontend-jaxws</artifactId>
10        <version>${cxf.version}</version>
11    </dependency>
12    <dependency>
13        <groupId>org.apache.cxf</groupId>
14        <artifactId>cxf-rt-transports-http-jetty</artifactId>
15        <version>${cxf.version}</version>
16    </dependency>
17</dependencies>

发布

 1public class JaxWsServer {
 2    public static void main(String[] args) {
 3        JaxWsServerFactoryBean factory = new JaxWsServerFactoryBean();
 4        factory.setAddress("http://localhost:8080/ws/user");
 5        factory.setServiceClass(UserWS.class);
 6        factory.setServiceBean(new UserWSImpl());
 7        factory.create();
 8        System.out.println("soap ws is published");
 9    }
10}

访问http://localhost:8080/ws/user?wsdl

②Web发布

配置依赖

 1    <properties>
 2        <project.build.sourceEncoding>UTF-8</project.build.sourceEncoding>
 3        <spring.version>4.0.5.RELEASE</spring.version>
 4        <cxf.version>3.0.0</cxf.version>
 5    </properties>
 6
 7    <dependencies>
 8        <dependency>
 9            <groupId>org.springframework</groupId>
10            <artifactId>spring-web</artifactId>
11            <version>${spring.version}</version>
12        </dependency>
13        <dependency>
14            <groupId>org.apache.cxf</groupId>
15            <artifactId>cxf-rt-frontend-jaxws</artifactId>
16            <version>${cxf.version}</version>
17        </dependency>
18        <dependency>
19            <groupId>org.apache.cxf</groupId>
20            <artifactId>cxf-rt-transports-http</artifactId>
21            <version>${cxf.version}</version>
22        </dependency>
23    </dependencies>

配置web.xml

 1 <listener>
 2     <listener-class>org.springframework.web.context.ContextLoaderListener</listener-class>
 3 </listener>
 4 <context-param>
 5     <param-name>contextConfigLocation</param-name>
 6     <param-value>
 7         classpath:spring.xml
 8     </param-value>
 9 </context-param>
10
11 <servlet>
12     <servlet-name>cxf</servlet-name>
13     <servlet-class>org.apache.cxf.transport.servlet.CXFServlet</servlet-class>
14 </servlet>
15 <servlet-mapping>
16     <servlet-name>cxf</servlet-name>
17     <url-pattern>/*</url-pattern>
18 </servlet-mapping>

发布

 1<beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
 2       xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
 3       xmlns:context="http://www.springframework.org/schema/context"
 4       xmlns:jaxws="http://cxf.apache.org/jaxws"
 5       xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans
 6       http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans-4.0.xsd
 7       http://www.springframework.org/schema/context
 8       http://www.springframework.org/schema/context/spring-context.xsd
 9       http://cxf.apache.org/jaxws
10       http://cxf.apache.org/schemas/jaxws.xsd">
11
12    <context:component-scan base-package="top.rainynight.sitews.user.ws" />
13
14    <!-- 下面的方法更简单
15    <jaxws:server address="/ws/user">
16        <jaxws:serviceBean>
17            <ref bean="userWS"/>
18        </jaxws:serviceBean>
19    </jaxws:server>
20    -->
21
22    <jaxws:endpoint implementor="# userWS" address="/ws/user" />
23</beans>

访问http://localhost:8080/ws/user?wsdl

调用服务

①静态客户端

 1public class JaxWsClient {
 2
 3    public static void main(String[] args) {
 4        JaxWsProxyFactoryBean factory = new JaxWsProxyFactoryBean();
 5        factory.setAddress("http://localhost:8080/ws/user");
 6        factory.setServiceClass(UserWS .class);
 7
 8        UserWS userWS = factory.create(UserWS .class);
 9        User result = userWS .lookOver(1);
10        System.out.println(result);
11    }
12}

②动态代理客户端

 1public class JaxWsDynamicClient {
 2
 3    public static void main(String[] args) {
 4        JaxWsDynamicClientFactory factory = JaxWsDynamicClientFactory.newInstance();
 5        Client client = factory.createClient("http://localhost:8080/ws/user?wsdl");
 6
 7        try {
 8            Object[] results = client.invoke("lookOver", 1);
 9            System.out.println(results[0]);
10        } catch (Exception e) {
11            e.printStackTrace();
12        }
13    }
14}

③通用动态代理客户端

既可调用 JAX-WS 服务，也可调用 Simple 服务

 1public class DynamicClient {
 2
 3    public static void main(String[] args) {
 4        DynamicClientFactory factory = DynamicClientFactory.newInstance();
 5        Client client = factory.createClient("http://localhost:8080/ws/user?wsdl");
 6
 7        try {
 8            Object[] results = client.invoke("lookOver", 1);
 9            System.out.println(results[0]);
10        } catch (Exception e) {
11            e.printStackTrace();
12        }
13    }
14}

④Spring客户端

 1<beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
 2       xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
 3       xmlns:jaxws="http://cxf.apache.org/jaxws"
 4       xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans
 5       http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans-4.0.xsd
 6       http://cxf.apache.org/jaxws
 7       http://cxf.apache.org/schemas/jaxws.xsd">
 8
 9    <jaxws:client id="userWSClient"
10                  serviceClass="top.rainynight.sitews.user.ws.UserWS"
11                  address="http://localhost:8080/ws/user"/>
12
13</beans>

 1public class UserWSClient{
 2
 3    public static void main(String[] args) {
 4        ApplicationContext context = new ClassPathXmlApplicationContext("spring-client.xml");
 5
 6        UserWS userWS= context.getBean("userWSClient", UserWS.class);
 7        User result = userWS.lookOver(1);
 8        System.out.println(result);
 9    }
10}

2.REST风格

定义接口

!REST 规范允许资源类没有接口

请求方式注解，包括：@GET、@POST、@PUT、@DELETE

请求路径注解，包括：@Path ，其中包括一个路径参数

数据格式注解，包括：@Consumes（输入）、@Produces（输出），可使用 MediaType 常量

相关参数注解，包括：@PathParam（路径参数）、@FormParam（表单参数），此外还有 @QueryParam（请求参数）

 1package top.rainynight.sitews.user.ws;
 2
 3import top.rainynight.sitews.user.entity.User;
 4import javax.jws.WebService;
 5
 6@WebService
 7@Path("/")
 8public interface UserWS {
 9
10    @GET
11    @Path("{id:[1-9]{1,9}}")
12    @Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
13    User lookOver(@PathParam("id") int id);
14}

实现接口

 1package top.rainynight.sitews.user.ws;
 2
 3import top.rainynight.sitews.user.entity.User;
 4import org.springframework.stereotype.Component;
 5
 6@Component("userWS")
 7public class UserWSImpl implements UserWS {
 8
 9    @Override
10    public User lookOver(int id) {
11        return new User();
12    }
13}

发布服务

①jetty发布

配置依赖

 1<properties>
 2    <project.build.sourceEncoding>UTF-8</project.build.sourceEncoding>
 3    <cxf.version>3.0.0</cxf.version>
 4    <jackson.version>2.4.1</jackson.version>
 5</properties>
 6
 7<dependencies>
 8    <dependency>
 9        <groupId>org.apache.cxf</groupId>
10        <artifactId>cxf-rt-frontend-jaxrs</artifactId>
11        <version>${cxf.version}</version>
12    </dependency>
13    <dependency>
14        <groupId>org.apache.cxf</groupId>
15        <artifactId>cxf-rt-transports-http-jetty</artifactId>
16        <version>${cxf.version}</version>
17    </dependency>
18    <dependency>
19        <groupId>com.fasterxml.jackson.jaxrs</groupId>
20        <artifactId>jackson-jaxrs-json-provider</artifactId>
21        <version>${jackson.version}</version>
22    </dependency>
23</dependencies>

发布

 1public class Server {
 2
 3    public static void main(String[] args) {
 4        // 添加 ResourceClass
 5        List<Class<?>> resourceClassList = new ArrayList<Class<?>>();
 6        resourceClassList.add(UserWSImpl .class);
 7
 8        // 添加 ResourceProvider
 9        List<ResourceProvider> resourceProviderList = new ArrayList<ResourceProvider>();
10        resourceProviderList.add(new SingletonResourceProvider(new ProductServiceImpl()));
11
12        // 添加 Provider
13        List<Object> providerList = new ArrayList<Object>();
14        providerList.add(new JacksonJsonProvider());
15
16        // 发布 REST 服务
17        JAXRSServerFactoryBean factory = new JAXRSServerFactoryBean();
18        factory.setAddress("http://localhost:8080/rs/user");
19        factory.setResourceClasses(resourceClassList);
20        factory.setResourceProviders(resourceProviderList);
21        factory.setProviders(providerList);
22        factory.create();
23        System.out.println("rest ws is published");
24    }
25}

访问http://localhost:8080/rs/user?_wadl

②web发布

配置依赖

 1    <properties>
 2        <project.build.sourceEncoding>UTF-8</project.build.sourceEncoding>
 3        <spring.version>4.0.6.RELEASE</spring.version>
 4        <cxf.version>3.0.0</cxf.version>
 5        <jackson.version>2.4.1</jackson.version>
 6    </properties>
 7
 8    <dependencies>
 9        <dependency>
10            <groupId>org.springframework</groupId>
11            <artifactId>spring-web</artifactId>
12            <version>${spring.version}</version>
13        </dependency>
14        <dependency>
15            <groupId>org.apache.cxf</groupId>
16            <artifactId>cxf-rt-frontend-jaxrs</artifactId>
17            <version>${cxf.version}</version>
18        </dependency>
19        <dependency>
20            <groupId>com.fasterxml.jackson.jaxrs</groupId>
21            <artifactId>jackson-jaxrs-json-provider</artifactId>
22            <version>${jackson.version}</version>
23        </dependency>
24    </dependencies>

配置web.xml

 1 <listener>
 2     <listener-class>org.springframework.web.context.ContextLoaderListener</listener-class>
 3 </listener>
 4 <context-param>
 5     <param-name>contextConfigLocation</param-name>
 6     <param-value>
 7         classpath:spring.xml
 8     </param-value>
 9 </context-param>
10
11 <servlet>
12     <servlet-name>cxf</servlet-name>
13     <servlet-class>org.apache.cxf.transport.servlet.CXFServlet</servlet-class>
14 </servlet>
15 <servlet-mapping>
16     <servlet-name>cxf</servlet-name>
17     <url-pattern>/*</url-pattern>
18 </servlet-mapping>

发布

 1<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
 2
 3<beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
 4       xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
 5       xmlns:context="http://www.springframework.org/schema/context"
 6       xmlns:jaxrs="http://cxf.apache.org/jaxrs"
 7       xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans
 8       http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans-4.0.xsd
 9       http://www.springframework.org/schema/context
10       http://www.springframework.org/schema/context/spring-context.xsd
11       http://cxf.apache.org/jaxrs
12       http://cxf.apache.org/schemas/jaxrs.xsd">
13
14    <context:component-scan base-package="top.rainynight.sitews.user.ws" />
15
16    <jaxrs:server address="/rs/user">
17        <jaxrs:serviceBeans>
18            <ref bean="userWS"/>
19        </jaxrs:serviceBeans>
20        <jaxrs:providers>
21            <bean class="com.fasterxml.jackson.jaxrs.json.JacksonJsonProvider"/>
22        </jaxrs:providers>
23    </jaxrs:server>
24</beans>

访问http://localhost:8080/rs/user?_wadl

调用服务

①JAX-RS 1.0 客户端

 1public class JAXRSClient {
 2
 3    public static void main(String[] args) {
 4        String baseAddress = "http://localhost:8080/rs/user";
 5
 6        List<Object> providerList = new ArrayList<Object>();
 7        providerList.add(new JacksonJsonProvider());
 8
 9        UserWS userWS = JAXRSClientFactory.create(baseAddress, UserWS.class, providerList);
10
11    }
12}

②JAX-RS 2.0 客户端

 1public class JAXRS20Client {
 2
 3    public static void main(String[] args) {
 4        String baseAddress = "http://localhost:8080/rs/user";
 5
 6        JacksonJsonProvider jsonProvider = new JacksonJsonProvider();
 7
 8        List<User> userList = ClientBuilder.newClient()
 9            .register(jsonProvider)
10            .target(baseAddress)
11            .path("/1")
12            .request(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
13            .get(new GenericType<List<User>>() {});
14    }
15}

③WebClient 客户端

 1public class CXFWebClient {
 2
 3    public static void main(String[] args) {
 4        String baseAddress = "http://localhost:8080/rs/user";
 5
 6        List<Object> providerList = new ArrayList<Object>();
 7        providerList.add(new JacksonJsonProvider());
 8
 9        List<User> userList = WebClient.create(baseAddress, providerList)
10            .path("/1")
11            .accept(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
12            .get(new GenericType<List<User>>() {});
13
14    }
15}

④AJAX客户端

1$.ajax({
2  type: 'get',
3  url: 'http://localhost:8080/rs/user/1',
4  dataType: 'json',
5  success: function(data) {
6//...
7  }
8});

跨域方案1：jsonp

1<dependency>
2    <groupId>org.apache.cxf</groupId>
3    <artifactId>cxf-rt-rs-extension-providers</artifactId>
4    <version>${cxf.version}</version>
5</dependency>

 1<jaxrs:server address="/rs/user">
 2    <jaxrs:serviceBeans>
 3        <ref bean="userWS"/>
 4    </jaxrs:serviceBeans>
 5    <jaxrs:providers>
 6        <bean class="com.fasterxml.jackson.jaxrs.json.JacksonJsonProvider"/>
 7        <bean class="org.apache.cxf.jaxrs.provider.jsonp.JsonpPreStreamInterceptor"/>
 8    </jaxrs:providers>
 9    <jaxrs:inInterceptors>
10        <bean class="org.apache.cxf.jaxrs.provider.jsonp.JsonpInInterceptor"/>
11    </jaxrs:inInterceptors>
12    <jaxrs:outInterceptors>
13        <bean class="org.apache.cxf.jaxrs.provider.jsonp.JsonpPostStreamInterceptor"/>
14    </jaxrs:outInterceptors>
15</jaxrs:server>

 1$.ajax({
 2    type: 'get',
 3    url: 'http://localhost:8080/rs/user/1',
 4    dataType: 'jsonp',
 5    jsonp: '_jsonp',
 6    jsonpCallback: 'callback',
 7    success: function(data) {
 8        //...
 9    }
10});

跨域方案2：cors

1<dependency>
2    <groupId>org.apache.cxf</groupId>
3    <artifactId>cxf-rt-rs-security-cors</artifactId>
4    <version>${cxf.version}</version>
5</dependency>

 1<jaxrs:server address="/rs/user">
 2    <jaxrs:serviceBeans>
 3        <ref bean="userWS"/>
 4    </jaxrs:serviceBeans>
 5    <jaxrs:providers>
 6        <bean class="com.fasterxml.jackson.jaxrs.json.JacksonJsonProvider"/>
 7        <bean class="org.apache.cxf.rs.security.cors.CrossOriginResourceSharingFilter">
 8            <property name="allowOrigins" value="http://localhost"/>
 9        </bean>
10    </jaxrs:providers>
11</jaxrs:server>

allowOrigins 设置客户端域名

IE8 中使用 jQuery 发送 AJAX 请求时，需要配置 $.support.cors = true

～～警告～～

!warning 极重要，cxf在wsdl中发布的targetNamespace是实现类路径，而被调用时却只接受接口路径。所以，请将接口与实现类放在同一路径下，或者在实现类中指定targetNamespace为接口的路径；否则客户端将抛出 ..common.i18n.UncheckedException: No operation was found with the name … 异常
